ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) can refrigerated jumbo buttermilk biscuits
1 (9.6 ounce) package Jimmy Dean® Original Hearty Pork Sausage Crumbles
Salt and ground black pepper to taste
Salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Bake biscuits according to package directions while preparing the gravy
Brown the sausage, then sprinkle flour over it and stir constantly for 1-2 minutes to create a roux
Gradually add milk while whisking to avoid lumps; simmer until thickened, about 5-10 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This classic breakfast dish requires coordination between biscuits and gravy. How would you keep both components hot and ready?
